channel.title: CVE Feed for Motorola Solutions -- Vigilant Fixed LPR Coms Box (BCAV1F2-C600)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Motorola Solutions -- Vigilant Fixed LPR Coms Box (BCAV1F2-C600)

item.title: CVE-2024-38282|2024-06-13T19:04:33.083Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: Utilizing default credentials, an attacker is able to log into the camera's operating system which could allow changes to be made to the operations or shutdown the camera requiring a physical reboot of the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-38283|2024-06-13T17:17:43.694Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: Sensitive customer information is stored in the device without encryption.

item.title: CVE-2024-38282|2024-06-13T17:13:39.781Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: Utilizing default credentials, an attacker is able to log into the camera's operating system which could allow changes to be made to the operations or shutdown the camera requiring a physical reboot of the system.

item.title: CVE-2024-38285|2024-06-13T17:26:46.091Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: Logs storing credentials are insufficiently protected and can be decoded through the use of open source tools.

item.title: CVE-2024-38280|2024-06-13T17:05:58.531Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: An unauthorized user is able to gain access to sensitive data, including credentials, by physically retrieving the hard disk of the product as the data is stored in clear text.

item.title: CVE-2024-38284|2024-06-13T17:22:10.318Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: Transmitted data is logged between the device and the backend service. An attacker could use these logs to perform a replay attack to replicate calls.

item.title: CVE-2024-38281|2024-06-13T17:10:36.156Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: An attacker can access the maintenance console using hard coded credentials for a hidden wireless network on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-38279|2024-06-13T17:00:20.515Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an attacker modifying the bootloader by using custom arguments to bypass authentication and gain access to the file system and obtain password hashes.

item.title: CVE-2024-38279|2024-06-13T18:30:17.758Z -- motorola%20solutions -- vigilant%20fixed%20lpr%20coms%20box%20%28bcav1f2-c600%29
item.description: The affected product is vulnerable to an attacker modifying the bootloader by using custom arguments to bypass authentication and gain access to the file system and obtain password hashes.
